sentences.en: How can we match our generosity against theirs?
sentences.cn: 我们怎么能和他们的慷慨大方相比 呢 ?

sentences.en: Our football team defeated theirs this time.
sentences.cn: 这一次我们的足球队胜了他们的足球队.

sentences.en: Our house is number 25, and theirs is just opposite.
sentences.cn: 我们的房子是25号，他们的就在对面。

sentences.en: Our house is white; theirs is brown.
sentences.cn: 我们的房子是白色的, 他们的是棕色的.

sentences.en: Our team tied with theirs in athletics.
sentences.cn: 在田径比赛中,我们队与他们队旗鼓相当.
我们这队胜了他们那队.

sentences.en: She shouldn't restrain her anger at this insensible attitude of theirs.
sentences.cn: 对他们这种无动于衷的态度,她抑制不住心头的怒火.

sentences.en: Such wishful thinking of theirs will never be realized.
sentences.cn: 他们的那种痴心妄想永远也不会实现.

sentences.en: Theirs are the children with very fair hair.
sentences.cn: 他们的孩子是那些长着满头金发的。

sentences.en: Theirs had been a happy and satisfactory marriage.
sentences.cn: 他们的婚姻曾经一直幸福美满。

sentences.en: Theirs had been an increasingly attenuated relationship.
There was a big group of a dozen people at the table next to theirs.
sentences.cn: 他们旁边的桌上坐了一大群人，有十几个。

sentences.en: This child is nobody's child until someone makes her theirs officially.
sentences.cn: 在有人办理正式手续认领以前，这个孩子不属于任何人。

sentences.en: Those dictionaries are theirs, not mine.
sentences.cn: 这些字典是他们的, 不是我的.

sentences.en: We compared scores and found that theirs were higher than ours.
sentences.cn: 我们比较了一下，发现他们的得分比我们的高。

sentences.en: We outdid our competitors by offering a better product at a lower price than theirs.
sentences.cn: 我们以更低的价格提供更多的产品而战胜了竞争对手.

sentences.en: We will fight to the bitter end to ensure our children get what is rightfully theirs.
sentences.cn: 我们会斗争到底，确保我们的孩子得到理应属于他们的东西。

sentences.en: When our washing machine broke, our neighbours let us use theirs.
sentences.cn: 我们的洗衣机坏了的时候，邻居就让我们用他们的。

trans.tran_en: used to refer to something that belongs to or is connected with people that have already been mentioned
used to refer to something that belongs to or is connected with people that have already been mentioned
